item.title: Getting Started with Orchestra Testbench for Laravel Package Development
item.description: The goal of this article will allow one to setup a stand alone package working with it’s own tests and has access to all of the normal Laravel workflows outside of Laravel. So you can build it using the easier conventions and helpers Laravel offers. Since my work will include database usage I will grab both packages: composer require --dev "orchestra/testbench:<=3.5" "orchestra/database:v3.5.0" I will setup my composer.json after this as such:
